verbs.description: [ARG0: red dead redemption 2 money glitch] [V: gets] [ARG4: you] [ARG1: lots of gold bars red dead redemption 2] hearkens back to a simpler time when america paper money was n't yet inflated ten dollars was a lot of money back then but with one weird trick you can render the game economy functionally meaningless by roping in thousands of dollars in seconds as detailed by raz on youtube you can exploit a glitch to trick the game into thinking you have n't picked up a gold bar even as it repeatedly gets added to your inventory it red dead redemption gold money youtube arthur limpany america raz
